participant_1.background:
I am happy to be with my family, even if they are all grown up.
I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
i am the oldest sibling.
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.
My music is my escape.

participant_2.background:
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
i ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

content.text: What's your favorite comic?
My favorite comic book series is Saga.
Oh my gosh, I love that one too! I'm so excited for the next issue.
Me too! Have you read any of Brian K. Vaughan's other series?
I have! I loved Y: The Last Man and Paper Girls.
Yes! Y: The Last Man is one of my all-time favorites. I'm so sad it's over.
Same here. But I'm glad it ended on a good note.
Me too. I'm really looking forward to reading Paper Girls when it comes out in paperback.
I have the first volume, but I haven't had a chance to read it yet.
You should definitely check it out! It's really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Do you have any other favorite comics?
I also really like The Sandman and Watchmen.
Those are both great classics! I'm a big fan of Neil Gaiman.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
What do you like about his work?
I love his imagination and his ability to create such unique and memorable characters.
I agree. He's a really talented writer.
He is! I'm excited to see what he does next.
Me too
